content: both sleeves set-up decrease round k 2 1 4 4 1 k2tog *k 5 4 5 4 4 k2tog repeat from * to last 3 3 5 6 3 sts k to with larger needles and beginning at the center end of underarm sts pick up and k 2 2 3 4 4 sts total sleeve stitch count in the gap between the co sts and held sts pick 36 40 52 56 60 up and k 2 2 3 4 4 sts work chart 8 k 46 53 60 65 72 sts from on hold switch to smaller needles in the next gap pick up and k 2 2 3 4 4 sts work in 1x1 ribbing for 2 5cm pick up and k 3 3 3 4 4 co sts place marker bobble all sts using tubular bind-off total stitch count finishing 56 64 72 80 88 block to desired measurements enjoy © copyright dear ingénue | all rights reserved | 2022 | v 1 1 6 phd candidate abbreviations bobble bind off cc1 contrasting color 1 cc2 contrasting color 2 co cast on dbl st yarn forward slip the last stitch worked to the right needle pull the yarn over the top of the needle and into position to work the next stitch decrease decrease increase increase k knit k2tog knit two stitches together m1 make on extra stitch by lifting the bar between the two current stitches and putting it on the left needle from back to share front then knitting into the
